content.question: <math alttext="x open parentheses t close parentheses"><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></math><math alttext="y open parentheses t close parentheses"><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></math><math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math><math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math><math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math><math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math><math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math><math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math><math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math><math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math><math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math><math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math><math alttext="3"><mn>3</mn></math><math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math><math alttext="4"><mn>4</mn></math><math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math><math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math> Values for the parametric function <math alttext="f open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math> are given in the table at selected values of <math alttext="t"><mi>t</mi></math>. On which of the following intervals of <math alttext="t"><mi>t</mi></math> are the start point and end point of the graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> farthest from each other?

choices.label: <math alttext="open square brackets 0 comma 1 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open square brackets 0 comma 2 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open square brackets 0 comma 3 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="open square brackets 0 comma 4 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open square brackets 0 comma 2 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
